questions.question: What does your aura look like?

answers.answer: /static/goose/goose-house-aura.svg
answers.alt: aura made of white and blood orange colors

answers.answer: /static/frog/frog-house-aura.svg
answers.alt: aura made of green and pink orange colors

answers.answer: /static/stars/stars-house-aura.svg
answers.alt: aura made of aquamarine and silver colors

answers.answer: /static/moth/moth-house-aura.svg
answers.alt: aura made of black and grey colors

answers.answer: /static/hyacinth/hyacinth-house-aura.svg
answers.alt: aura made of purple and black colors

questions.question: How would you prepare your toad to compete in the Toad Race?

answers.answer: Throw my toad a party to get them excited for the race
Run my toad through a vigorous training program
Give my toad a nice spa day to relax before the race
Not super interested in the whole Toad Race thing, I'd rather just write a poem about my toad
No preparation needed, my toad is a natural born winner!

questions.question: How would your friends describe you?

answers.answer: Super confident, a great strategist, and very spontaneous
A reliable friend, always there, but is very strongly willed
Very charming, giving, and always cracking some jokes
Patient, sensitive, and someone you can trust with anything
Someone who nevers give up, works really hard at everything they set their mind to, and a forgiving friend

questions.question: If you could take 3 things to a desert island what would they be?

answers.answer: Flippers, painting supplies, my best friend
First aid kit, my favorite book, self-purifying water bottle
Sleep mask, my cell phone, a bag full of all my makeup and beauty supplies
My favorite playlist, a journal, tarot deck
My award winning toad, hand sanitizer, the perfect spell book

questions.question: What do you want to be when you grow up?

answers.answer: Surfer
President
Actor/Actress
Author
Police Officer

questions.question: What would you do if you had to catch a bad guy?

answers.answer: Strategically plan to catch the evil doer
Study hard to learn everything I can about the treacherous villain
Charm my way into being friends with this terribly misunderstood being
Win the fiend over by baking them a delicious cake. If they don’t like it, hex them with a spell.
Bravely confront them about their evil deeds and hope they change for the better

questions.question: It’s the weekend. How are you recharging?

answers.answer: By throwing the absolute BEST party in town
Easy. I’m knitting a cuddly new scarf for my Toad
Darling, I’m putting on my most fancy outfit and going to the opera of course
I’m staying put at home and will spend the whole weekend daydreaming
Gotta train my toad for the big Toad Race and practice a few hexes. No rest for us!
